title: So, When is Devourer Being Nurfed?
body: only becuase yi, udy can 1v5 everything

replies.body: Play Lulu into Udyr / Yi... GG ezpz.

It doesn't need it.

Kite and CC will make Udyr and Yi absolutely worthless.
Don't get into melee range of someone who does damage at melee range.

It's a pretty simple concept.

> [{quoted}](name=SirArcticWarfare,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=En0kZEix,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-21T08:18:49.028+0000)
>
> only becuase yi, udy can 1v5 everything

How can you even think Devourer needs a nerf?
It takes a long time to ramp up and minimises the jungler's early game. Notice how Devourer was never bought in professional play?
It seems you are struggling with Master Yi and Udyr specifically.

You can max Devourer at 15 minutes as most champs that use it, while also ganking heavily at the same time.

It's not gotten in professional play because it doesn't fit the style of the pro-scene.
In the pro-scene you want either instant burst or tank-CC from your jungle, none of the champions that fit this use Devourer.
not for melee based champions so much
